title: Interpretation of a dream about a child falling into the pelvis

preview.html: But what is the interpretation of a dream about a child falling into the sink, and this is what we will talk about in this article with multiple interpretations of great dream interpreters, so follow this article from our website gptafser.com/. Interpretation of seeing a child falling into the sink in a dream for a single girl When an unmarried girl dreams that the child falls into the gutter. The vision indicates many negative changes that will occur in her life in the near future. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is in her workplace and that the child fell but survived and returned again. It indicates that she will face a big problem in her profession, but she will overcome it and find herself in a higher position. When a single girl sees that an amount of her money has gone down the drain. But she then finds that there is a child giving her this amount in the form of silver coins. The vision was a strong indication that she will marry a righteous man, and she will have great sustenance and good offspring. An unmarried woman who sees in her dream that there is a child falling his head into the sink, but he is not harmed. This dream was a great sign and sign of the presence of envy and black magic in her life. And it must be protected by the remembrance of God, and be Close to God, and God knows best. See also: Interpretation of seeing a fall or falling in a dream and its meaningInterpretation of seeing a child falling into the basin in a dream for a married womanSeeing a married woman in her dream that a child falls into the basin. She says that she will go through a very difficult stage in her life. This may indicate that her life will soon be affected by a serious psychological crisis. This is due to the many problems between her and her husband. Falling into a hole in a married woman's dream and not surviving is her inability to solve all the problems in a joint way. This vision also shows that she is unable to continue her life in the way she prefers, but there are strong problems that bother her. When a married woman sees in her dream that a child fell into a deep hole and was able to survive this fall. The vision shows that this woman is strong and that she can, with all her strength and determination, get rid of all the problems that burden her. It is also an indication that there are negative words that affect her. But her strong personalities can destroy all the problems she goes through and get rid of them. Interpretation of seeing a child falling into the basin in a dream for a man and its meaningA man sees in a dream that a child fell into a deep hole. It shows that he lacks many feelings around him. A man sees a gutter in His dream was in an unknown place. It indicates the presence of a fornicator in his life. If a married man sees that his son has fallen into the abyss. The vision was a strong warning to him that he must take care of his children. He must beware of them, and there are envious eyes watching them, so he protects them with the Holy Qur’an, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. A man walks in a street in a dream and sees that there is a very deep hole in the dream. It indicates his tension and resentment at losing his job or losing money. Perhaps it indicates thinking a lot about work, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. A man who dreams of sewers and their dirty water and a sink with water in it, is a strong indication that he is afflicted with magic. He must take care of himself and care for those around him. And fortify himself with the Qur’an

title: Interpretation of seeing a bracelet in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a bracelet in a dream through the website roy2a.com, the bracelet is one of the decorative tools that women use on their wrists for decoration, and there are many types of bracelets that are made of different models such as gold, silver, metal, threads, stones, etc. Seeing a bracelet in a dream is It is one of the famous visions and we will discuss it today in detail and explain the most important interpretations of the great dream interpretation scholars such as Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, Imam Al-Sadiq and Ibn Shaheen, so follow us. Interpretation of seeing a bracelet in a dream. Seeing a bracelet in a dream indicates in relation to the restrictions or work, actions and duties required of the viewer. Seeing the loss of a golden bracelet in a dream is in reference to... The end of anxiety, fatigue, and responsibility. Seeing a silver bracelet in a dream indicates that the dreamer clings to the subjects of his religion. An iron bracelet in a dream indicates strength and authority. Seeing a thread bracelet in a dream indicates that it affects the viewer of people nearby. A broken bracelet in a dream indicates separation or Problems. Finding a bracelet in a dream is an indication that the fortuneteller knows his responsibilities and acts accordingly. Losing a bracelet in a dream is a sign of lost responsibilities. A gold bracelet in a man’s dream. An unpleasant vision indicates a wrong and cunning personality. See also: Interpretation of seeing gold in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a bracelet in a dream for a son. Sirin Ibn Shirin says that I saw the white bracelet in a dream. A good vision heralds hearing good news. Gold bracelet in a dream. It indicates a broad diet and changes in material circumstances for the better. Seeing the bracelet lost in a dream An unpleasant vision portends that something will happen in the dreamer’s life that will bother him. Colored bracelet in a dream. Harbinger Good luck and success in achieving your goals. See also: Interpretation of seeing a cut gold chain in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a bracelet in a dream for a single woman. Seeing herself wearing a silver bracelet in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates her success and distinction in her studies or work. As for wearing a gold bracelet for a single woman in a dream? An indication that her wedding date is approaching. Buying a bracelet in one dream. A good vision indicates that wealth and goodness will enter her life. Cutting the bracelet in one dream indicates that she is going through a bad period due to her failure in important matters in her life. Seeing a fire bracelet in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates the presence of an envious and hater. And the magic of those around her. Interpretation of seeing a bracelet in a dream for a married woman. Seeing a gold bracelet in a dream indicates that a married woman enjoys halal and good food and blessings on her money and children. The husband giving his wife a bracelet in a dream is a sign of a strong and friendly relationship and understanding between them. Taking off the bracelet in a married woman’s dream indicates a dispute between her and her. Her husband or in her home. Cutting a bracelet in a married woman’s dream indicates disagreements and problems in her home and between her husband and may lead to separation. See also: Interpretation of seeing gold in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a bracelet in a dream for a pregnant woman. Seeing herself wearing a white bracelet in a pregnant woman’s dream will be easy to indicate her birth.

No matter how different they are, they will remain his brothers. You may also be interested in knowing the color yellow in a dream. Also, many dream scholars believe that same-sex intercourse with a woman to a woman or a man to a man is evidence of your mahrams working together in a dream that may indicate usury or forbidden money. This indicates the presence of a lot of transgressions and sins, and the desire to get closer From God and returning to Him and atonement for sins. A person may see that his sister is the one accompanying him in a dream, and this indicates a disturbance in the relationship between them. Interpretation of seeing a sister having sex in a dream, a dream of incest. Interpretation of seeing a sister by Ibn Sirin. Seeing intercourse with a sister in a dream is considered a strong issue. Which must have a strong interpretation from a sheikh who testifies to it with confidence, which causes great tension and anxiety for the monarch. Some scholars interpret that a brother’s intercourse with his sister in a dream indicates the brother’s fear of her from the future, protecting her from harm from people, and fear of being exposed to any harm related to honor. The sister. Ibn Sirin said in his interpretation that seeing a brother dreaming of having intercourse with his sister in a dream is evidence of his intense interest in her from the ugly souls of people and from the future. It is a sign of his intense love and jealousy of people, his constant attachment to her, standing by her side, defending her, and feeling fatherly. Towards her. Seeing a sister chatting with her brother is evidence of the intense love between them and the preservation of each other’s secrets. He interpreted the dream of a brother marrying his sister as evidence of understanding between them in reality. title: Interpretation of a dream about a dove by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: The dove is a symbol of peace and is always associated with peace and security in the human mind, but seeing it in a dream has many connotations. VariousIn this article, the interpretation of a dream about a dove in a dream, based on the opinion of Imam Ibn Sirin regarding the married, married, and pregnant woman. Interpretation of a dream about a dove in a dream, according to Ibn Sirin. Imam Muhammad Ibn Sirin said that seeing the dream is about A dove in a dream is one of the visions that contains many connotations, and the interpretations of this dream vary according to the nature of the dove in the dream. When a person sees pigeons in a nest in a dream, this dream indicates the harmony and intimate relationship that the dreamer enjoys with his partners or with his wife if he is married. If the color of the dove in the dream is black, then this dream has a negative connotation, as it shows the many disputes and problems that occur between the dreamer and his family. A black pigeon entering the house in a dream means that you will hear sad news that will negatively affect the viewer’s soul. The interpretation of the dream can be about A dove in a dream is positive, because it indicates many joys that surround the dreamer’s life, if this pigeon is small. If a person takes a bath in a dream, Imam Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of this dream is that the dreamer will get a lot of money and his life will improve a lot. Eating a pigeon In a dream, it indicates that the dreams that the dreamer has always dreamed of will come true. If the girl sees this vision, she will get married, but her husband will be a cunning person. If the dreamer wanted to catch a pigeon, but this pigeon escaped and the dreamer was unable to catch it, then the interpretation of the dream is The dreamer will be greatly disappointed. If a person sees pigeons crying in a dream, this dream means the death of one of the dreamer’s relatives. Read also: Learn about the interpretation of dreams about Ibn Sirin with the letter Al-Hataf. The interpretation of a dream about bathing in a dream for a single woman. The interpretation of seeing a dream about a dove in a dream for a single woman is one of Interpretations that carry many omens, especially if the doves are white and fly in flocks, as this dream symbolizes the fulfillment of all his aspirations and the achievement of his goals. If an unmarried girl sees a flock of pigeons, the interpretation of this dream shows that she loves peace and does not want to see two different individuals, so she wants to end the problems between the two quarrels. The same previous dream shows that the dreamer has the quality of hard work and patience until she achieves what she seeks. It is the reason for the dreamer’s success in her academic and professional life. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream a group of black pigeons, this is an unexpected vision, as it indicates that she will face some problems in her life, and some interpreters tend to interpret this dream as an association with an irresponsible young man. . The man who will be the cause of her unhappiness. When an unmarried girl sees that she is taking a bath in a dream, this is a good vision that indicates that she will achieve great benefit. If the bath that an unmarried girl took in a dream is in bad condition, then this dream indicates that she will suffer from some fluctuations In her life to a large extent. Interpretation of a dream about bathing for a woman

title: What is Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing eyebrows in a dream?

preview.html: What you do not know about the interpretation of seeing eyebrows in a dream. The interpretation of seeing eyebrows in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing beautiful eyebrows and taking care of them? Why did jurists warn against seeing unequal eyebrows in a dream? Does eyebrow color have a strong meaning? What is the legal interpretation of seeing long and short eyebrows? Learn about the interpretations of the vision in the following paragraphs. Do you have a confusing dream? what are you waiting for; Google is an Egyptian site for interpreting dreams. Eyebrows in dreams. The dreamer’s eyebrows. If their shape is beautiful, and the shape of his face in general is distinctive and bright, then he will receive great protection and care from God in his life. The sick dreamer who looks in the mirror and finds his eyebrows symmetrical and smooth in a dream, this is the health and strength that he He acquires them in reality. Some jurists said that if the dreamer sees the shape of his eyebrows in a dream as distinctive and attractive, then he is immune from incurable diseases and will live the years of his life enjoying activity and luxury. A man dreams that his eyebrows are beautiful and equal, unlike their real shape, the dream indicates his physical and functional strength. The Sultan or the President Whoever sees his eyebrows in a dream will become more beautiful than they were, because he will achieve many victories in reality and his prestige will increase among people. And if a man sees that his eyebrows are symmetrical and looks at them carefully in a dream, he will become a husband to two women in reality. If the dreamer’s eyebrows are black, knowing that their shape Not bad, the vision means growth for the better, abundance of money, and the dreamer’s success in his social life, whether inside or outside the family. In some books on the interpretation of dreams, it is stated that the eyebrows are black and have a special shape, and the dreamer was proud of them in the dream. Eyebrows in a dream for a son Sirin Ibn Sirin said that the symbol of the eyebrow is one of the symbols that shows hidden aspects, especially in the dreamer’s life, as it shows his economic, health and social condition. If the dreamer’s eyebrows are in bad condition and he feels ashamed of them in the dream, this is a deterioration in his life and he may be exposed to loss and poverty or contract a disease. It makes his life deteriorate and takes a lot. Steps back. If the dreamer’s eyebrow vomits in a dream and their shape changes and becomes acceptable and distinctive, this indicates the fairness of his condition and the change in the sad circumstances he previously lived in to happy events and days full of positive energy. If the dreamer sees that the color of his eyebrows is strange and that the shape of his face is bad and unacceptable. The dream suggests that he will face many problems that will make him worry and worry in the near future. What did Ibn Sirin say in interpreting seeing eyebrows in a dream? Eyebrows in a dream for a single woman. Interpretation of a dream about eyebrows falling out for an unmarried woman indicates news if she sees at the beginning of the dream that the shape of her eyebrows It didn't fit her face and suddenly she saw her hair falling out and new hair starting to grow. Her eyebrows changed and became beautiful, black in color and soft in texture. If the dreamer’s eyebrows were beautiful, but they fell out in the dream and instead long, thick, frightening eyebrows appeared, then this indicates many experiences in her life that change her psychological and moral state so that she can live. Long periods of Digg

Interpretation of a dream about eyebrows falling out for an unmarried woman indicates news if she sees at the beginning of the dream that the shape of her eyebrows It didn't fit her face and suddenly she saw her hair falling out and new hair starting to grow. Her eyebrows changed and became beautiful, black in color and soft in texture. If the dreamer’s eyebrows were beautiful, but they fell out in the dream and instead long, thick, frightening eyebrows appeared, then this indicates many experiences in her life that change her psychological and moral state so that she can live. title: Interpretation of seeing a lion in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a lion in a dream through the Vision website roy2a.com. Seeing a lion in a dream has many meanings. Seeing it can be a sign of good or a harbinger of evil. Interpreters differed in interpreting the vision of a lion in a dream, depending on the condition and circumstances of the viewer, and whether the man or woman is single, married or pregnant, and today through the Vision website we discuss the interpretation. In detail, seeing a lion cub in a dream, based on the opinion of senior interpreters such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Katheer, Al-Nabulsi and Imam Al-Sadiq, follow us. What is Ibn Sirin's interpretation of seeing a lion in a dream? Seeing a lion in a dream indicates many positive changes in the dreamer's life. Seeing a lion in the house in a dream indicates that the fortuneteller is a beloved person who has a special value with his family and they do everything to make him happy. Seeing a lion attacking in a dream indicates that the dreamer is going through a difficult period with many problems and crises that will make him sad and unhappy. Seeing a lion's daughter in a dream indicates that the fortuneteller gets a lot of money from his trade. Seeing a lion in a dream can also indicate failure in the dreamer's life that will make him feel despair and disappointment. See also: Interpretation of seeing a lion and escaping from it in a dream What is the interpretation of seeing a lion in a dream for a single woman? Seeing a single lion in a dream It says that she is in a relationship with a young man who has many good qualities and this relationship will end in marriage. Seeing an unmarried woman biting a lion in a dream It indicates a mean girl in her life who is conspiring against her to fall In love with her. Seeing a single lion attacking its prey in a dream indicates that someone will propose to her, but he is a bad man who does not suit her, and this vision is considered a warning to her. Seeing a single wounded lion in a dream says that there are bad and wrong words being said about her behind her back. Seeing a single lion suckling in a dream announces that she will achieve great success in her academic and professional life. See also: Interpretation of seeing a lion in a dream What is the interpretation of seeing a lion in a dream for a married woman? Seeing a dead married lion in a dream is a sign of many misfortunes for her and her family. Seeing a married woman raising a lion at home in a dream indicates that she is a good mother and does everything for her children. Seeing the birth of a lion in a dream indicates the end of all the problems in her life in the coming period. Seeing a married lion in a dream announces her husband's intense love for her. Seeing a lion attacking in a dream indicates that there are many differences between her and her husband that can lead to divorce. What is the interpretation of seeing a lion in a dream for a pregnant woman? Seeing a pregnant lion in a dream announces that she will give birth to a male, and God knows best. Seeing the dreamer attacking a lion in a dream shows that she will face many Health problems during pregnancy. What is the interpretation of seeing a lion in a dream for a man? Seeing a man taking care of a lion in a dream indicates that God will bless him with a male child, and God knows best. Seeing a man following the paths of a lion in a dream indicates that he will go through a difficult period full of problems and crises. Seeing a man a lion in a dream indicates his pursuit of making large profits from his trade. See also: Interpretation of seeing a lion in a dream What does it mean?

title: Learn the interpretation of frying fish in a dream from Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about frying fish in a dream. In the interpretation books of major interpreters such as Imam Al-Sadiq and Al-Nabulsi, it differs depending on the marital status, whether she is single, married, or pregnant. Frying fish in a dream by Ibn Sir. Interpretation of a dream about frying fish in a dream is an indication that the doors of goodness and livelihood are opened before the dreamer. Anyone looking for work will get what he wants in the coming days. Frying fish is considered a sign of abundant livelihood, especially after the dreamer has gone through a long period of hardship and hardship. Whoever sees in a dream that he himself is frying fish and it smells wonderful, the dream indicates the arrival of many Of money in the coming days and the possibility that this money will be through inheritance. Frying fish is evidence of a new project in which the dreamer will enter as a major partner and obtain a lot of financial profits. Fried fish in a student’s dream is an indication of his academic excellence and high grades in the final evaluation of the academic year. Fried fish is considered one of the favorite visions, as it indicates that the dreamer will be able to obtain what he has been looking for and striving for for a long time. If you see yourself frying fried fish and then eating it and you feel happy because of its delicious taste, then the dream expresses the arrival of good news and that All family members will soon meet on a happy occasion. Frying fish in a dream by Ibn Sirin Large-sized fried fish indicates multiple disputes that arise between family members, and disputes may arise between them for several days. Ibn Sirin indicated that seeing fried fish is evidence that the priest’s prayer is answered. From his Lord, one should avoid despair and continue to pray to get what he wants soon. Eating fried fish is evidence that the dreamer will be on the road to travel in the coming days, and the reason for the trip varies from one dreamer to another, whether for work, study, or pleasure. Fried fish has Fish Fried fish in a dream in general is evidence of many benefits reaching insight, in addition to a noticeable improvement in one’s psychological and material conditions. Dreaming of frying fish in a dream for a single womanFrying fish for an unmarried woman is a sign of her imminent marriage to a good man who always seeks to see her happy, because It will come as she always wanted. The fried fish for the firstborn boy is an indication of the expansion of her livelihood and that she will occupy high positions that will make her prominent in her professional and social surroundings. The dream also indicates the fulfillment of hopes and ambitions and that she will find a new job opportunity that will significantly improve her financial situation. Fry fish in a dream For a married woman: Interpretation of a dream about frying fish for a married woman is an indication of abundance of money, as the husband will find a new job that will improve his social status.B

title: Interpretation of seeing a judge in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a judge in a dream, meanings of seeing a judge in a dream, the symbol of a judge in a dream, a dream of a single woman, a married woman, and a pregnant woman with a judge. The evidence that we explain through today’s article on our Vision website. Interpretation of seeing a judge in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Seeing a judge in a dream speaking well to a priest indicates a high status for the major. Seeing a judge with a happy face in a dream indicates joy and kindness for the major. Seeing the unknown judge in a dream announces the Lord. The Almighty. Seeing a judge in a sick person’s dream announces the approach of his term and death. Seeing a judge in a dream with a measure indicates the character of the seer of justice. A merchant sees that he has become a judge in a dream. It indicates complete measure and balance. The dreamer sees that he does not establish justice among people in a dream. He says that he is a traitor to honesty and is characterized by deception. The traveler saw that he became a judge in a dream. It states that the dreamer occupies a high position. Seeing the weight of the judge’s scales in the dream states that the dreamer seeks forgiveness from God Almighty. Seeing the judge in a dream weighing the money indicates the corruption of the sultan or the ruler. Interpretation of seeing a judge in a dream for a single woman. Seeing a single woman who has become A judge in a dream indicates reaching the highest levels of success and distinction. Seeing an unmarried woman in a dream is a judge who does not judge justice among people. It indicates a financial crisis or the loss of something expensive. Interpretation of seeing a judge in a dream for a married woman: Seeing a married woman in a dream, the judge had a happy face. She indicated The vision indicates that she will become pregnant soon. The woman who saw that the judge divorced her from her husband in a dream. The vision showed the strength of the bond between her and her husband. Interpretation of seeing the judge in a dream for a pregnant woman. The pregnant woman sees that she is judging her children fairly because it looks very good. Seeing a pregnant woman in a dream is a judge who does not He rules with justice. It indicates a great loss that happened to her. Interpretation of seeing a judge in a dream for a man. A man’s vision that he has become a judge who rules among people justly indicates his high status among people. A man sees that he cannot rule among people to please God Almighty. It indicates a great loss. Interpretation of seeing a judge In a young man’s dream: Seeing a young man in a dream of a righteous judge indicates the sustenance, blessing, and goodness that he enjoys in his life. Seeing a young man in a dream of an unjust and unjust judge indicates that he will be exposed to many crises and losses. Interpretation of a sick person seeing a judge in a dream. A sick person seeing that he has become a judge in a dream mentioned his recovery from the diseases that afflicted him. By God’s command. Seeing a sick person in his dream that he is accused of committing a crime and being tried by a judge. The vision showed that he will die soon. Interpretation of seeing a judge in a dream for Nablus. Seeing a judge in a sick person’s dream shows the severity of his illness and pain. Seeing a judge in a traveler’s dream announces his marriage soon. Seeing a fortune teller that he is weighing money on a scale highlighted his bad morals and the corruption of his faith. Seeing a lawyer sleeping in front of judges indicates the end of problems and the removal of worries. We are happy to see you receiving your dream about “interpretation of seeing a judge,” through comments and the dream team will interpret your dream, respond and communicate with you.

title: Interpretation of a dream about eating chocolate in a dream, Fahd Al-Osaimi

preview.html: Eating chocolate in a dream Fahd Al-OsaimiChocolate is one of the sweets that children and adults love, and wedge chocolate is one of the sweets that makes people happy and improves their mood. Today and until today, we will talk about eating chocolate in a dream Fahd Al-Osaimi. What is the interpretation of this vision? Follow us. Eating chocolate in a dream Fahd Al-Osaimi for a single woman: Eating chocolate In a dream for a single girl, and she enjoyed it, this indicates that there is happiness awaiting the owner of this dream. Also, seeing chocolate in a single girl’s dream could mean that she is achieving her dreams and what she aspires to. If an unmarried girl dreams that she is buying chocolate in a dream, this indicates On the success that she will achieve in her professional and scientific life. Eating chocolate in a dream Fahd Al-Osaimi for a married woman: If a married woman dreams that she buys chocolate in large quantities for herself and her family, this means that she lives in a house full of happiness and love between her husband and her children. But if a married woman dreams of eating Chocolate with her husband, this means that the problems she was experiencing with her husband will end, and God knows best. If a married woman dreams of receiving a box of chocolate as a gift from her husband, this indicates her attachment and love for her husband. Eating chocolate in a dream Fahd Al-Osaimi about a pregnant woman: If a pregnant woman dreams that she She eats chocolate in a dream, this means that her life will change for the better and she will be happy with this change. But if a pregnant woman dreams in a dream that her husband gives her chocolate, this indicates the intense love that the husband has for his wife and that they live in a marital relationship full of love, stability and happiness. But if the woman A pregnant woman dreams of making chocolate at home, which means that she is going through a tiring stage of pregnancy, and the difficulties of pregnancy are increasing for her, and God knows best. Eating chocolate in a dream by Fahd Al-Osaimi, about a divorced woman: If a divorced woman dreams that she is eating chocolate, this means that she will get rid of all the worries, problems, and obstacles in her life, but She must be patient, and God knows best. But if a divorced woman dreams that she is preparing chocolate at home, this indicates that she will be able to achieve her goals and ambitions. Eating chocolate in a dream Fahd Al-Osaimi for men: After interpreting our dream about eating chocolate in a dream Fahd Al-Osaimi for married, single, and divorced women, we will now point out To the interpretation of eating chocolate in a dream, Fahd Al-Osaimi for a man, follow us: If a man dreams that he is buying chocolate in a dream for his household, this means that this dreamer will obtain a lot of sustenance and his family will be happy with it, and God knows best. Also, the dream of chocolate in a man’s dream may indicate that he has achieved Great success in his field of work and this success will bring him a lot of livelihood and profits, God willing. What is the interpretation of a gift of chocolate in a dream? If a woman dreams that her husband gives her chocolate, this indicates the deep feelings of love that her husband feels towards her and his strong attachment to her. Eating chocolate in a dream Fahd Al-Osaimi for men: After interpreting our dream about eating chocolate in a dream Fahd Al-Osaimi for married, single, and divorced women, we will now point out To the interpretation of eating chocolate in a dream, Fahd Al-Osaimi for a man, follow us: If a man dreams that he is buying chocolate in a dream for his household, this means that this dreamer will obtain a lot of sustenance and his family will be happy with it, and God knows best. Also, the dream of chocolate in a man’s dream may indicate that he has achieved Great success in his field of work and this success will bring him a lot of livelihood and profits, God willing. What is the interpretation of a gift of chocolate in a dream? If a woman dreams that her husband gives her chocolate, this indicates the deep feelings of love that her husband feels towards her and his strong attachment to her.
